message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a limited time at the special price of $230. I think you'll find it's a great deal!

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price? I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $230 is already a significant discount on this product's true value.  Could you meet me halfway at $175?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to stick to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $150, which is still higher than what I initially offered. Would you be able to match this price?
